name: Soumyajit Mohapatra
title: Software Engineer
aboutMeOne: Hello! I'm Soumyajit Mohapatra, a Front-End Developer based in Bangalore, India. With over three years of experience in web and mobile application development, I specialize in crafting stunning, user-friendly interfaces using React.js, TypeScript/JavaScript, and SCSS. Whether it's building dynamic user interfaces from scratch. I thrive on transforming complex challenges into elegant solutions.
aboutMeTwo: My toolkit is packed with modern development skills: React.js, Redux, HTML, CSS, SCSS, React-Native, Node.js, SQL/PostgreSQL, Git, Bitbucket, JIRA, and more. I'm a firm believer in continuous learning and have honed my skills with certifications in advanced React.js, web development, and JavaScript. Let's connect and create something amazing together!

whatIDo.title: Passionate Coder
whatIDo.description: I create modern web applications with clean, efficient code for a seamless user experience.

whatIDo.title: Lifelong Learner
whatIDo.description: I continuously explore new technologies and frameworks to enhance my skills.

whatIDo.title: Adventurous Explorer
whatIDo.description: I travel and capture moments through photography, drawing inspiration from each journey.

whatIDo.title: Gaming Enthusiast
whatIDo.description: If I'm not coding or traveling, there is a very good chance I'm playing video games.
